message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this incredible product at a price of $1,200,000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm confident it'll be a valuable asset. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to come down to $900,000 just yet.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $1,050,000?  This still leaves a good profit margin for you, and it's a significant step towards reaching a deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $950,000. That's my final offer. I'm not willing to go any higher.
